Posts.Content: Katedw32 . Your welcome Hun .  Please let me no how things go tomorrow .  You will be fine I'm sure .  Nesslay
Posts.Title: One stop breast clinic

Posts.Content: You will be scared Hun I was absolutly petrified when I got my diagnosis .  My sister came in with me .  I was looking at the doctor and all I could see was her mouth moving .  I wouldn't even acknowledge the Macmillan nurse .  Then things went from there had a double whammy as my sister also got diagnosed after I finished Chemo .  Both of us have the BRCA 1 gene  Which as far as I'm concerned is a fucker not the greatest . We still haven't finished yet as we both have got to have ovaries out yet .  But we will get through it
Posts.Title: One stop breast clinic

Posts.Content: Please katedw32 Please don't google anything as you will end up .  Making yourself poorly and you don't need that on top of everything that's going on .  I'm sure you will be fine .  Iv been going through this for just about two years  Diagnosis . Lumpectomy . Lymph node removal . And in the end a double mastectomy and reconstruction , which went wrong .  But hey shit happens . You will go up and down as u don't really no what's going on yet .  But chin up solder on the pandas are wonderful on her as carolyn
Posts.Title: One stop breast clinic

Posts.Content: I had my opp on the 3 within I would say infection set in with in three days by day eight I was in a&he .  Infection was a week stay in hospital and removal of implants .

Posts.Content: 32Slightly abnormal .  Think positive even if you don't feel like it .  Hopefully it will just be an infection and nothing else . Thanks for letting me no Hun .

Posts.Content: Bless ya chin up , time stands still for no man so they say .  But waiting is the worst but I'm sure you will be fine .  Take care .
